events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer role and will review it shortly.
The application has been categorized under Engineering as it matches the software developer position in our team.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will be in touch soon to discuss the next steps in the process.
Your initial screening call for the software engineer role has been completed successfully with positive feedback.
The candidate has promptly responded with availability for the upcoming technical interview session.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate due to take place next week as part of the evaluation process.
The candidate completed the technical interview with strong problem-solving skills and deep engineering knowledge.
We have arranged an HR interview to discuss cultural fit and benefits with the candidate later this week.
HR interview went smoothly, and the candidate expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
We have extended a formal offer to the candidate for the software engineer position with our competitive package.
The candidate has provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about potentially joining.
The candidate has officially accepted the job offer and we are moving forward with onboarding preparations.
The onboarding process has begun to welcome the new software engineer into our development team.
The hiring process for the software engineer position has been successfully completed and the candidate has joined the company.
